General.Name: Sun International Ltd
General.Description: Sun International Limited owns and operates casino, hotel, and resort properties in South Africa and Nigeria. It also provides management service businesses in the hotel, resort, casino, and gambling industry. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Sandton, South Africa.
General.Address: 6 Sandown Valley Crescent, Sandton, South Africa, 2196

2.Name: Mr. Andrew G. Johnston
2.Title: Director of Legal, Compliance & Corp. Service and Group Company Sec.
